definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to talk shop all the time (idiom)
pinyin: san1 ju4 hua4 bu4 li2 ben3 hang2

sentences.english: He is the master of his own trade.
sentences.chinese: 他是他本行業的能工巧匠。

sentences.english: Then it would seem that the disciples went back to their fishing for a short period.
sentences.chinese: 之後，門徒似乎有一段短時間回去作捕魚的老本行。

sentences.english: The first, the whole knowledge need by the academic association profession industry also develop.
sentences.chinese: 第一，學會本行業所需要的一切知識並有所發展。

sentences.english: Regional legislation shall apply to administrative cases arising in the region concerned.
sentences.chinese: 地方性法規適用於本行政區域內發生的行政案件。

sentences.english: The Bank reserves the right to accept any order for collection only.
sentences.chinese: 本行保留僅以代收方式接納任何付款指示之權利。

sentences.english: But these have largely struggled against the industry’s behemoths.
sentences.chinese: 但是它們也很難同本行業內的巨擘競爭。

sentences.english: Not promote their own interest at the expense of the profession, client or employer.
sentences.chinese: 不能促進他們在本行業，客戶或僱主的好處爲代價。

sentences.english: Local people's governments at various levels shall place under their protection cultural relics in their respective administrative areas.
sentences.chinese: 地方各級人民政府保護本行政區域內的文物。

sentences.english: The good news is that the GP knows what they are managing.
sentences.chinese: 好消息就是普通合夥人知道如何幹好本行。

sentences.english: All matters or disputes will be subject to the final decision of the Bank and FORTRESS.
sentences.chinese: 如有任何爭議，本行及豐澤將保留最終決定權。

sentences.english: But like many others, Lana isn’t ready to trade in her law career for another just yet.
sentences.chinese: 跟很多人一樣，拉娜並不打算放棄她的法律本行。

sentences.english: He takes several learned journals and manages to be abreast of developments in his field.
sentences.chinese: 他訂閱了幾本學術刊物，對本行最新的發展非常清楚。

sentences.english: And so she returned to her old trade of catching flies again.
sentences.chinese: 於是，她又幹起老本行，捉蒼蠅去了。

sentences.english: You may apply for Bank's business units to collect and pay bills on your behalf.
sentences.chinese: 可申請於本行各營業單位代理收付款。

sentences.english: Means to do the Bank in this industry?
sentences.chinese: 指做本行本業的事，成績特別顯著。

sentences.english: Its benefits plan for freelancers is highly competitive in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 在本行業內它的福利方案是很有競爭力的。

definition: business in which a company has traditionally engaged (e.g. before diversifying)/original business/core business/(literary) agriculture
different trades, worlds apart (idiom); to sb outside the profession, it is a closed book
